p: For butyrylcholinesterase inhibition assay, the same Ellman's method as mentioned above was followed except that the enzyme solution was 50 μL and butyrylthiocholine iodide was used instead of acetylthiocholine iodide. Galantamine was taken as a reference standard. The butyrylcholinesterase inhibitory activity (% inhibition) was calculated utilizing the same formula as mentioned above for acetylcholinesterase activity. The IC 50 values for each plant extract were calculated from the graph plotted as percent inhibition against concentration using nonlinear regression analysis.
